text: The Great American Bash (2005) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) for their SmackDown! brand. It was held on July 24, 2005 at the HSBC Arena in Buffalo, New York. It was the 16th Great American Bash event overall and the second event held by WWE. ==Matches== # Matches Stipulations Times Sunday Night Heat Paul London (c) defeated Nunzio Singles match for the WWE Cruiserweight Championship 2:33 1 The Legion of Doom (Heidenreich and Road Warrior Animal) defeated MNM (Joey Mercury and Johnny Nitro, with Melina) (c) Tag team match for the WWE Tag Team Championship 6:45 2 Booker T (with Sharmell) defeated Christian Singles match 11:52 3 Orlando Jordan (c) defeated Chris Benoit Singles match for the WWE United States Championship 14:23 4 The Undertaker defeated Muhammad Hassan (with Daivari) Singles match to become the number one contender for the World Heavyweight Championship 8:04 5 The Mexicools (Super Crazy, Juventud, and Psicosis) defeated The Blue World Order (Big Stevie Cool, The Blue Meanie, and Hollywood Nova) Six-man tag team match 4:53 6 Rey Mysterio defeated Eddie Guerrero Singles match 15:39 7 Melina defeated Torrie Wilson Bra and Panties match with Candice Michelle as the special guest referee 3:59 8 John "Bradshaw" Layfield (with Orlando Jordan) defeated Batista (c) by disqualification Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 19:47 (c) â€“ is the champion(s) going into the match ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Great American Bash 2005 website Category:2005 in American television Category:2005 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Buffalo, New York Category:World Wrestling Entertainment pay-per-view events Category:2000s in New York (state) Category:2005 in the United States Category:21st century in Buffalo, New York Category:July 2005 events
